name: paychex-tracking
description: Provides various tracking metrics for JavaScript applications.

scripts.build:dev: r.js.cmd -o optimize=none baseUrl=src name=../node_modules/almond/almond include=Tracking out=build/tracking.js wrap.startFile=wrap.start.txt wrap.endFile=wrap.end.txt
scripts.build:prod: r.js.cmd -o baseUrl=src name=../node_modules/almond/almond include=Tracking out=build/tracking.min.js wrap.startFile=wrap.start.txt wrap.endFile=wrap.end.txt
scripts.build: npm run-script build:dev && npm run-script build:prod

author: Paychex, Inc.
